text_imagine:
Imagine being able to transmit your memories, knowledge, and personality to future generations.
With Legathum's neurotechnology, human consciousness transcends time.
text_transforme_experiencias: Transform your experiences, knowledge, and memories into an eternal personal AI.
txt_do_cerebro_a_nuvem: From the brain to the cloud: your mind, eternalized
texto_cloud_comment: Store your personality, memory, and experience on encrypted servers.
texto_vector_comment: Social network where virtual clones act as mentors, artists, or relatives.
texto_ampulheta_comment: Self-awareness platform to overcome limiting beliefs and interact with your best self.
texto_main_title: Mentorship with a Digital Steve Jobs
texto_description: Digital recreation with the principles, knowledge, and personality of Steve Jobs for continuous mentorship.
texto_universidade_california_comment: Joint research on neuroplasticity and AI ethics.
texto_kabhy_comment: Educational campaign with neurotechnology in favelas (slums/communities) alongside influencers.
texto_black_mirror_comment: How NeuroSync UpTransfer surpasses fiction. Comparison with ‘Be Right Back’ and Super Brain.
title_etica: The Ethics of Digital Life After Death
texto_etica_comment: Startup with researchers from UC Berkeley to reproduce the thoughts of the living and deceased.
title_title_kabhy_lame: Khaby Lame and the Democratization of Neurotechnology
texto_cultura_digital_comment: The TikToker promotes AI globally with over 8 million views.
texto_empresa_comment: Preserve the legacy of leaders and mentors with a virtual clone.
texto_investidores_comment: Finance the future of neuroscience and artificial intelligence.
resp_oque_e: An innovative platform that digitizes your mind using advanced AI and neuroscience.
resp_como_funciona:
Interact with the AI and share your experiences.
It evolves with your knowledge.
resp_para_quem: For those who wish to leave a legacy and share their wisdom with future generations.
txt_oque_dizem_sobre_nos: From the brain to the cloud: your mind, eternalized
texto_maria: I store my personality, memory, and experience on encrypted servers.
texto_joao:
With Legathum, I created a digital version of myself.
Now I can share my knowledge even after death.
texto_ana_oliv:
The interface is intuitive,
creating my digital self was a
journey of self-discovery.
texto_comece_agora_transforme: Start now and transform your experience into a unique AI.
texto_waiting_list_comment:
Receive news about AI
and digital preservation.
lbl_transforme_memorias:
Transforming memories into
eternal digital legacies through
artificial intelligence.
texto_alvo_comment: Democratize science, technology, and entrepreneurship for a global movement of consciousness, freedom, and education.
texto_missoes_comment: Transform lives through self-awareness, helping members and experts reach their full potential. Break frontiers with SciTechBiz.
text_legathum_ben_vindo: Legathum leads innovation by digitally recreating human consciousness. Born at the University of California, Berkeley, it uses advanced AI to create digital replicas that reflect personality, memories, and knowledge. It allows future generations to interact with their ancestors like never before. With Web3 technologies, Legathum transforms AI and digital legacy. It is not just a technology company: it is a catalyst for change in our perception of life, death, and memory.
txt_ecossistema_legathum: Discover how the Legathum universe can transform your digital presence and AI experience.
text_legathum_science_definition: Legathum Science is a scientific journal dedicated to disseminating current and relevant knowledge.
text_legathum_science_ecosystem_mission: In our ecosystem, we seek minds that push the boundaries of knowledge, from technology to human development, sharing discoveries and ideas.
text_legathum_ai_concept: Legathum AI is an innovative platform with a revolutionary concept: preserving human consciousness through experiences, memories, and wisdom, beyond simple data storage.
text_legathum_ai_interaction_legacy: This system allows the living to interact with the deceased, and future generations to engage with leaders and historical figures.
text_legathum_my_conscience_approach: My Conscience: your digital consciousness. We capture and digitize the human essence to dialogue with great minds of the past.
text_legathum_ambition: Legathum My Conscience revolutionizes mental digitization, allowing interaction with your best self. A future based on love and consciousness.
text_legathum_my_conscience_exp: A revolutionary approach to mental digitization. It promotes self-awareness and continuous growth by dialoguing with your limitless self.
text_ecosystem_legathum_discover: Discover how the Legathum universe can transform your digital presence and AI experience.
text_card_lsn_description: An ecosystem that combines AI and psychology. Create your legathum (AI agent) and interact as in a social network.
text_card_explore_world_description: Experience immersive virtual environments built with Unreal Engine 5. Explore, interact, discover.
text_card_legathum_immortals_description: Virtual mentors of celebrities and historical figures. Biographies, chats, videos, and virtual museum experiences.
text_quote_deibson: With Legathum, we don't just dream the future: we create it.
